The University of Miami mens basketball team rebounded from Tuesday nights loss to Ohio State with an RPIboosting road victory against Kentucky  Saturday night at Rupp Arena PERIOD

Senior guard Jack McClinton led the 21stranked Hurricanes  with  points a game after being ejected during the first half against the Buckeyes PERIOD

Junior guard James Dews scored a seasonhigh  points and made four of UMs eight threepointers PERIOD

The Wildcats  trailed  before getting within four points despite shooting less than  percent from the field PERIOD

Miami returns home to take on Florida International  at  p.m Friday night PERIOD

The Miami Hurricane is the student newspaper of the University of Miami in Coral Gables Florida PERIOD The newspaper is edited and produced by undergraduate students at UM and is published in print every Tuesday and online everyday during the academic year PERIOD
title: Canes hold off Wildcats, win 73-67 - The Miami Hurricane
name: University of Miami
